summary: Experienced Financial Operations Specialist with a demonstrated history of working in the financial/banking services industry. Skilled in various Oracle based ERP systems including SAP, Salesforce, Vector, EPC and such as Sales, Customer Service, Microsoft Office and Microsoft Excel. Strong finance professional graduated from RISEBA University. Skilled in (AML) Anti-Money Laundering. Endorsed problem solving skills. Team player as well as independent individuum.
